name: Garden of Eat'n
description:
PLEASE PLAY THE TUTORIAL ON THE MENU FIRST!

Playable in Co-op.

Controls:

Controller:

A - Interact/Buy

Left Stick - Move

Left Trigger - Buy Mode

Right Trigger - Throw held items

Y - Despawn (if stuck)

B - Tooltip Menu

X - Next text

Keyboard:

E - Interact/Buy

WASD - Move

Right Click - Buy Mode

Hold Left Click - Throw held items

Spacebar - Despawn (if stuck)

Tab - Tooltip Menu

Q - Next text

In this game, you play as a Grim Reaper named Grimm, who decided to open a restaurant. He was only able to afford a store in Purgatory. Starting off small, you will need to serve the Angels and Demons of the realms. Earning money from your business, Grimm wants enough to pay off the loan he took for the store.

Credits:

Arthur Mairs - 3D Modeller / Writer

Zack Grimley - 3D Modeller

Aaron Mairs - Programmer / Sounds
